title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1600.4 - Written requests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1600.4 - Written requests

State Regulations

Written requests to examine public employment records of the
commission will be made on form AC-375 by members of the news media. Such
applications will be submitted to Sharon Grey, Secretary to the Commission, Agency Building #4, Empire State Plaza, Albany, New York
12223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1600.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
